body: So in the morning i just download this hack to try it out in nexus. it was cool but i didnt feel like i was doing the right thing  but i kept using it for some reason and i wanted to stop but i couldnt. sooner later a mod came and ban me for hacking. i love this server and i apologize for using the hacks. i all ready remove it and i wish to be back to the server. Thank you

Thank you
title: Im Sorry....

replies.body:
Sucks, but I don't feel like you should be able to join back. You knew you were hacking and you had a good time doing it " i kept using it for some reason and i wanted to stop but i couldnt", in a simplified way, you like it.
Try your luck and appeal at support@avicus.net
